channel.title: attack.t1003.002 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1003.002 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Suspicious Process Writes Ntds.dit
item.description: Detects suspicious processes that write (copy) a Active Directory database (ntds.dit) file

item.title: PowerShell SAM Copy
item.description: Detects suspicious PowerShell scripts accessing SAM hives

item.title: QuarksPwDump Dump File
item.description: Detects a dump file written by QuarksPwDump password dumper

item.title: SAM Dump to AppData
item.description: Detects suspicious SAM dump activity as cause by QuarksPwDump and other password dumpers

item.title: Mimikatz Use
item.description: This method detects mimikatz keywords in different Eventlogs (some of them only appear in older Mimikatz version that are however still used by different threat groups)

item.title: Antivirus Password Dumper Detection
item.description: Detects a highly relevant Antivirus alert that reports a password dumper

item.title: Cred Dump-Tools Named Pipes
item.description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via specific named pipes

item.title: Credential Dumping Tools Service Execution
item.description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via service execution events

item.title: Esentutl Volume Shadow Copy Service Keys
item.description: Detects the volume shadow copy service initialization and processing via esentutl. Registry keys such as HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\VSS\Diag\VolSnap\Volume are captured.

item.title: Grabbing Sensitive Hives via Reg Utility
item.description: Dump sam, system or security hives using REG.exe utility

item.title: Mimikatz Command Line
item.description: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments

item.title: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity
item.description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL

item.title: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity - Zeek
item.description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL. Based on the SIGMA rules/windows/builtin/win_impacket_secretdump.yml

item.title: QuarksPwDump Clearing Access History
item.description: Detects QuarksPwDump clearing access history in hive

item.title: Registry Dump of SAM Creds and Secrets
item.description: Adversaries may attempt to extract credential material from the Security Account Manager (SAM) database either through Windows Registry where the SAM database is stored

item.title: Registry Parse with Pypykatz
item.description: Adversaries may attempt to extract credential material from the Security Account Manager (SAM) database either through Windows Registry where the SAM database is stored

item.title: Shadow Copies Access via Symlink
item.description: Shadow Copies storage symbolic link creation using operating systems utilities

item.title: Shadow Copies Creation Using Operating Systems Utilities
item.description: Shadow Copies creation using operating systems utilities, possible credential access

item.title: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares
item.description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares

item.title: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares - Zeek
item.description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares

item.title: Volume Shadow Copy Mount
item.description: Detects volume shadow copy mount

item.title: VSSAudit Security Event Source Registration
item.description: Detects the registration of the security event source VSSAudit. It would usually trigger when volume shadow copy operations happen.
